question.sparql: SELECT ?{parameter1} ?{parameter2} WHERE { ?country wdt:P31 wd:Q6256 . ?country wdt:P36 ?city . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" . } } LIMIT 10
SELECT ?{parameter1} ?{parameter2} WHERE { ?country wdt:P31 wd:Q6256 . ?country wdt:P36 ?city . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" . } } LIMIT 10

question.text: To which {country} does this flag belong?

question.sparql: SELECT ?continentLabel ?countryLabel ?pop ?area ?cord ?pic ?pointLabel ?aboveSealevel WHERE { ?country wdt:P31 wd:Q6256. ?country wdt:P30 ?continent. ?country wdt:P1082 ?pop. ?country wdt:P610 ?point. ?country wdt:P2046 ?area. ?point wdt:P2044 ?aboveSealevel. ?point wdt:P18 ?pic. ?point wdt:P625 ?cord. OPTIONAL { ?aboveSealevel wdt:P2237 wd:Q11573. } SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". }

question.text: In which country {National Park} is located?
